aguiaj.iscte

Class BinaryImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • aguiaj.iscte.BinaryImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aguiaj.draw.IImage

    public class BinaryImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements aguiaj.draw.IImage
    Represents binary images, where each pixel only has two possible values (black or white), with constant dimension.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos

    • Method Detail

      • fromMatrix

        public static BinaryImage fromMatrix(boolean[][] matrix)
        Constructs a binary image from a boolean matrix. 1st dimension for row, 2nd dimension for column. false represents white, whereas true represents black.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Image data
